meanings.definition: Relating to the anatomy of animals.
meanings.sent1: The zootomic features of the lion's body help it survive in the wild.
meanings.sent2: Veterinarians often use zootomic knowledge to treat injured animals.
meanings.sent3: The zootomic differences between a cat and a dog can be quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Her zootomic expertise was crucial in identifying the species of the bird.
meanings.sent5: The zootomic details of the frog's skeleton were carefully examined by the scientist.

meanings.sent1: Learning zootomic can help us understand how animals' bodies work.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a course in zootomic for aspiring veterinarians.
meanings.sent3: She found zootomic to be a challenging but rewarding subject to study.
meanings.sent4: The zootomic textbook provided detailed illustrations of various animal structures.
meanings.sent5: His passion for zootomic led him to pursue a career in wildlife conservation.
